Signature module¶

class signature.Signature(num_beats=1, beat=Fraction(1, 4), Signature=None)¶

Bases: object

Default ctor - creates a 1/4 signature with no inputs

Parameters

  • num_beats (int) – Number of beats in a measure

  • beat (Fraction) – Value of one beat

  • Sinature – Act as copy ctor when signarure is not None

Returns

Returns a Signature object

Return type

Signature
